remarks: Equivalence of two versions of the Axiom of Choice.  The proof uses neither AC nor the Axiom of Regularity.  The right-hand side is our original ~ ax-ac .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.)
statement:
aceq0 $p |- ( E. y A. z e. x A. w e. z E! v e. z E. u e. y ( z e. u /\ v e. u ) <-> E. y A. z A. w ( ( z e. w /\ w e. x ) -> E. v A. u ( E. t ( ( u e. w /\ w e. t ) /\ ( u e. t /\ t e. y ) ) <-> u = v ) ) ) $.
$d t u v w x y z $.
